## ChampionMasteryManager.fetch() method

Fetch a champion's mastery data for the summoner.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetch(champion: Champion | string, options?: {
        force: boolean;
    }): Promise<ChampionMastery>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  champion | [Champion](./shieldbow.champion.md) \| string | The champion (or its ID) whose mastery data needs to be fetched. |
|  options | { force: boolean; } | <i>(Optional)</i> The basic fetching options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[ChampionMastery](./shieldbow.championmastery.md)<!-- -->&gt;
